DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is: 1) to assess pediatric resident knowledge of adolescent mental health; 2) to assess pediatric resident comfort level for screening, assessing, and treating mental health disorders in adolescents, and; 3) to evaluate pediatric resident current practices for adolescent mental health screening, assessment, and treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Educational Intervention for Optimizing Adolescent Mental Health Screening and Treatment in Pediatric Residency
DOC.keyword: Pediatric Resident knowledge of mental health topics
Pediatric Resident current practices for screening and treating mental health disorders
Pediatric Resident mental health care competency
